text: Todd Phillips (born Todd Bunzl; born December 20, 1970) is an American filmmaker. Phillips was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Adapted Screenplay in Borat. ==Movies== *Road Trip (2000) *Old School (2003) *Starsky & Hutch (2004) *Borat (2006) *School for Scoundrels (2006) *The Hangover (2009) *Due Date (2010) *The Hangover Part II (2011) *Project X (2012) *The Hangover Part III (2013) *War Dogs (2016) *A Star Is Born (2018) *Joker (2019) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:Movie directors from New York City Category:Movie producers from New York City Category:Screenwriters from New York City Category:Actors from New York City
title: Todd Phillips
